identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a developer workflow tool that feels like a futuristic control room, not a generic SaaS dashboard.

core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Terminal aesthetics with Swiss typography.
Emotion First: The user should feel powerful and in control.
Content is King: Data density is a feature, not a bug for developers.
Negative Space: Use it to group logic, not just for decoration.
Contrast: High contrast for code legibility and alert states.
anti_patterns: No full-screen gradients. Use texture and deep backgrounds.

rules: Overlines/Labels must be Uppercase + tracking-widest + text-xs.
Line height: Tight (1.1) for headings, Relaxed (1.6) for body.
Text on hover must explicitly change color (e.g., hover:text-white).
Borders should be subtle (#27272a) unless active/focused.

grid_system.marketing: Mode A: The Tetris Grid (Asymmetric, gap-8)
grid_system.dashboard: Mode B: The Control Room Grid (Dense, gap-4, grid-cols-4)

spacing.rule: Use 2x more spacing than typical. Containers with borders must have internal padding (p-6).

components.marketing_components: Custom HTML + Tailwind. No pre-built cards.

customization_rules.cards: Use 'Grid Borders' style. No shadow by default. 1px border. Square or sm radius.
customization_rules.buttons: Sharp edges or rounded-md. No pill shapes. High contrast hover.
customization_rules.inputs: Flat background (#18181b), distinct border. Focus ring: primary color.

visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: Use for active cards or pricing tables.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use for sticky headers and overlays.
visual_enhancers.grid_borders: Use for dashboard layout (border-r, border-b on items).
visual_enhancers.scanlines: Optional overlay for 'Terminal' feel in specific sections.

media.icons: Lucide React (default), Phosphor Icons (for dense dashboards)

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through z-index and layered elements.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Never use AI assistant emojis (ðŸ¤–, ðŸš€) as icons.
All interactive elements must have data-testid.
instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the design system by updating tailwind.config.js first. Then create a global layout wrapper. Use the specified fonts. When building the dashboard, strictly follow the 'Control Room' grid mode.
